mapper.sql: id, country, frist_code, frist_name, two_code, two_name, link_code, pv, uv, ss, create_date
mapper.insert: insert into t_analysis_channel (id, country, frist_code, frist_name, two_code, two_name, link_code, pv, uv, ss, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fristCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fristName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ss,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into t_analysis_channel
id,
country,
frist_code,
frist_name,
two_code,
two_name,
link_code,
pv,
uv,
ss,
create_date,

mapper.update:
update t_analysis_channel
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frist_code = #{fristCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frist_name = #{fristName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
two_code = #{twoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
two_name = #{twoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_code = #{linkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uv = #{uv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ss = #{ss,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_analysis_channel set country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frist_code = #{fristCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frist_name = #{fristName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, two_code = #{twoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, two_name = #{twoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_code = #{linkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uv = #{uv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ss = #{ss,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select sum(pv) pv, sum(uv) uv, sum(ss) ss from t_analysis_channel where 1 = 1
and create_date = #{createDate}
